definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Wen Jiabao (1942-), Premier of PRC from 2003-2013
Wenzhou prefecture level city in Zhejiang
to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline

sentences.english: The bursts have much more energy than the normal local variations in temperature.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的爆發具備相比常規溫變強大的多的能量。

sentences.english: We may take the form of a thermostatically controlled housing temperature.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以採取恆定控制罩溫的形式。

sentences.english: I'm Edwin. I'll show you to your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是愛德溫，我帶你去旅館。

sentences.english: Like Dong, Wintour thinks she is never wrong.
sentences.chinese: 與董明珠一樣，溫圖爾認爲自己從不出錯。

sentences.english: They have more bottom end, a warmer, mellower mid and upper mid-range, and often more top octave.
sentences.chinese: 低端豐滿，中頻又溫又純，更經常在極高頻段更出彩。

sentences.english: Eight is for a nice warm bed.
First I need to take your temperature.
Choose the part classic documentation for this purpose , specially, the model carrying out temperature wine pot outward appearance analyses.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，特選部分典型案例，進行溫酒壺外觀造型分析。

sentences.english: Abundant kidney-yang warms and promotes all the viscera and organs.
sentences.chinese: 腎陽足，肌體各臟腑組織器官得以溫平和推動。

sentences.english: I"m Edwin, I"ll show you to your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是愛德溫，來帶你去旅館。

sentences.english: Water is not cool, unexpectedly is warm, seemed slightly salty, very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 水不涼，竟是溫的，好像還微微有點鹹，很舒適。

sentences.english: The technological specification of the pole by the high speed warm extrusion was worked out.
sentences.chinese: 擬製了磁極高速溫擠壓工藝規範。

sentences.english: LADY WINDERMERE. Why do you TALK so trivially about life, then?
sentences.chinese: 溫夫人那你“討論”人生爲什麼這麼不正不經呢？

sentences.english: His calm manner slaked their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他的冷靜態度使他們的狂熱降了溫。

sentences.english: Oprah's programme about literature, in which she reviews books.
sentences.chinese: 溫弗裏的文學節目是評論書籍的。

definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
